description:
Colgate® Optic White™ Expert Stain-Less Teeth Whitening Toothpaste is an enamel-safe fluoride toothpaste that deeply whitens dark stains* and has 2% Hydrogen Peroxide.

Smile on!
We believe glowing confidently starts by owning your smile. It doesn't matter what others think, as long as you keep your smile strong you can rock your day. 

Optic White Expert Stain-Less Teeth Whitening Toothpaste with 2% Hydrogen Peroxide removes dark stains from coffee, wine and soft drink* and whitens teeth with the whitening ingredient that dentists use**.

Colgate Optic White Expert Express toothpaste is:
- Enamel safe for daily use.
- Vegan.
- Sugar free.
- Gluten free.
- Responsibly made^

Size: 85g
Flavour: Cool Mint

With the same ingredient that dentists use to whiten teeth, we're here to help you be unstoppable. So flaunt your look and feel your best, knowing there is a little magic in every white smile.

*With continued use. Individual results may vary
**Contains gentle, lower strength hydrogen peroxide
^To learn more, visit colgatepalmolive.com.au/responsibly-made

TEETH WHITENING TOOTHPASTE: Colgate Optic White Expert Stain-Less teeth whitening toothpaste removes dark stains from coffee, wine and soft drink*

DEEPLY WHITENS DARK STAINS: With continued use, individual results may vary

HYDROGEN PEROXIDE: Colgate Optic White Expert Stain-Less Whitening Toothpaste contains 2% hydrogen peroxide

WHITENING INGREDIENT THAT DENTISTS USE: Contains gentle, lower strength hydrogen peroxide.

DAILY USE: This toothpaste is enamel safe, suitable for daily use
name: Colgate Optic White Expert Stain-less Teeth Whitening Toothpaste 85g
